about_the_game:
The Mesh Module DLC adds advanced mesh export options for game developers.

  • Optimize your meshes up to 90% for efficient rendering in all common game engines
  • Export color encoded STL for multi-colored 3D printing
  • Export voxels as individual cubes for physics simulations
  • Unlock more mesh export options like filename prefixes or output folders
